title: Add Nesterov Momentum
body_html:
Hi guys,

Would you be interested in adding Nesterov momentum to the SGD optimizer? I've got a version based on this parameterization that just drops in a quick couple of changes to the SGD file. I'm not entirely sure what test files would need to be modified to make this appropriate, but I'd be down to submit a pull request and hash that out if there's interest.

Best,

Andy

body:
Hi guys,

Would you be interested in adding Nesterov momentum to the SGD optimizer? I've got a [version](https://github.com/ajbrock/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/sgd.py) based on [this parameterization](https://github.com/lisa-lab/pylearn2/pull/136#issuecomment-10381617) that just drops in a quick couple of changes to the SGD file. I'm not entirely sure what test files would need to be modified to make this appropriate, but I'd be down to submit a pull request and hash that out if there's interest.

Best,

Andy
